segments.text: Good morning , may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , I want to remit one thousand Yuan to Magnolia Company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please fill out this form , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK ... Do I put on Magnolia Company for the receiver ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . You must put on its name and full address .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I see . Here you are . Is that OK now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me check . Yes . Your one thousand remittance , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you are . What is the rate ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This rate is one percent . That will be 10 Yuan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , when will this remittance arrive ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Generally it will arrive within a week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's good . Is there anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . That's all . You have to take good care of this copy of this transfer order .
segments.speaker: S1
